page.title: 04DOMISTIC & SOCIAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: DOMESTIC & SOCIAL ACTIVITIES ---------------------------- IN THE FAMILY ------------- FOR THE CHILDREN 7 WEEKS SCHOOL HOLIDAYS,ACTIVITIES INCLUDE SWIMMING DRAWING,PAINTING,LIMITED WATCHING OF TELEVISION AND FEEDING 2 GUINEA PIGS,RABBIT,CAT AND CHICKENS.SHOPPING IN NTH.WALSHAM,SMALL ITEMS BOUGHT AT LOCAL VILLAGE SHOP.FROR THE PAST 6MTHS I HAVE CATERED FOR :- A) A HIGH FIBRE DIET USING BRAN,RAW VEG ANDFRESH FRUIT (APPROX 1000 CALS /DAY) FOR MYSELF AND MY HUSBAND. B) COOKING FOR THE CHILDREN EG;SAUSAGE MINCE AND CHEESE DISHES. C)WEEKEND COOKING - SPICY FOODS - CURRY,SAGHETTI ETC
